# Camden Cultural Preservation Society

> Sydney-based ambient drone collective

## About

Camden Cultural Preservation Society is a Sydney-based ambient drone collective founded by long-time collaborators Liam Bray and Tim Causbrook, formerly of post-rock outfit Panzer Queen and the electronic project Saint Helier.

## Releases

### Misery Tourist EP (2025)
- Grief Merchants (04:42)
- Misery Tourist (04:04)
- The Economics of Conflict Imagery (04:40)

Recorded at home in the inner west between May and November 2024.
Composed and mixed by Liam Bray and Tim Causbrook.
Released August 10, 2025.

## Links

- Website: https://camdenculturalpreservationsociety.com
- Bandcamp: https://camdenculturalpreservationsociety.bandcamp.com

- Panzer Queen (post-rock): https://open.spotify.com/artist/6x3FsalMbSSvR2UZ8cpgw7
